name: Messi
comment: Excellent Service. It was a very small inconvenience, but I understand that for people who aren't internet savvy, it's important to give them easy instructions! Your customer service ROCKS! (Fixed Speed).

name: Neymar
comment: Great customer service. Bought a non oe grill from BD Car Parts.com for my 300c to mod and was unaware that it did not include installation hardware along  (Fixed Speed).

name: Ronaldo
comment: Bad part but made it right. Ordered a mirror for drivers side because OEM is ~$1000. The first one that came in didn't fold right. I contacted customer service (Fixed Speed).

name: Ronaldinho
comment: Return Policy. Car Part's was awesome on understanding my return issue even though it was past 90 day's. I will do business anytime with this company. (Fixed Speed).

name: Meradona
comment: Excellent Customer Service. I ordered a car part for my older vehicle and while the part didn't exactly have a perfect fit, I was able to make it work. (Fixed Speed).

name: Pele
comment: Part didn't fit. I ordered a replacement mirror for my truck (Order# CPZ372607362) but when it came it did not fit. I wrote a review stating as much  (Fixed Speed).

name: Jidan
comment: Fantastic support!. I initially had an issue with LSO delivery. BD Car Parts fixed the problem even though it was not an issue with BD Car Parts. (Fixed Speed).

name: Backhum
comment: Great Customer Service. BD Car Parts.com customer service is excellent. They were very helpful when purchasing a replacement part for my vehicle. I would highly recommend them. (Fixed Speed).
